name: DOCS_RCVD_MEDICAL_HX
description: This table contains information about patients' medical history.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: MED_HX_REF
columns.description: The unique reference identifier associated with the medical history.

columns.name: MED_HX_FREE_TXT_DT
columns.description: The free text date for this medical history.

columns.name: MED_HX_COMMENT
columns.description: The comments for the medical history.

columns.name: MED_HX_SRC_DXR_DOCUMENT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number of the received document record that owns the instance of this medical history.

columns.name: MED_HX_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The last update instant of the medical history in UTC.

columns.name: MED_HX_PAT_HX_RESP_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's response to the medical history question.

columns.name: MED_HX_SRC_QUESTION_ID
columns.description: The medical history question ID from a MyChart questionnaire.

columns.name: MED_HX_DX_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis identifier for the medical history.

columns.name: MED_HX_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the medical history questionnaire.

columns.name: MED_HX_TEMPLATE_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.
